page.title: 05EXAMPLES OF HOUSES 2 DOUNE
page.content: Mrs. Bain is our gym. teacher. Her house is a very large{Victorian {mansion,}and has a large garden with fields attached. The house has 13 rooms, 4 of which are bedrooms, but she would like a second bathroom. To heat her house, Mrs. Bain has two coal fires, oil central heating and a Raeburn. She does not like the situation, because the house faces on to the road. She would like it to face the river. Mrs. MacLean has a 150 yr. old{converted terraced {cottage.}It has 4 bedrooms, a kitchen/dining room, a bathroom and a living room. The house is heated by gas central heating and a wood-burning stove. It has a small back garden/patio and faces East/West. Mrs. MacLean doesn't like the situation as proximity to the park makes it noisy. { }
